name: The Journey Home (itch)
description:
This game is better if you play my last one, 'Home', first.

Downloads available below for the standalone version of the game (for people who can't run the WebGL player in their browser, although I can't promise the game will scale perfectly for every resolution).

A short story about the travels of an adventurer and a young girl she meets along the way.

All art, programming and music done by me. Made with Unity, with huge help from Fungus (an amazing free tool for Unity).

Thanks for playing!
